items.title: EARNED 5-STAR PODCAST: Notre Dame and the College Football Playoff Conspiracy
items.summary: Joshua and Jude celebrate Brendan’s birthday by opening the pod portal without him, because the Notre Dame Football universe doesn’t stop. In this episode: And MUCH more weaved inand out of the show.  Please RATE and REVIEW! All reviews left on Apple Podcasts will be read on the next Earned 5-Star Podcast. Go Irish!

items.title: 2026 National Signing Day: Notre Dame Football Commitment and NLI Tracker
items.summary: One by one, the Notre Dame Fighting Irish will add new members to its football family during the early signing period for the 2026 recruiting class. Rather than beat the site down with a profile piece after each of the recruits sent in their NLI, we simply offer this recruiting tracker for the day. OFD will offer […]

items.title: Notre Dame 76, Missouri 71: The Irish needed it, and took it
items.summary: Without exaggeration, tonight’s contest against the Missouri Tigers represented the most important game of the Micah Shrewsberry era to-date. Expectations are for the program to be in the hunt for an NCAA tournament bid, and for that to be a realistic possibility, there needs to be a quality non-conference win to point to. Beating Houston […]

items.title: Notre Dame moves to #10 because of college football playoff politics
items.summary: The penultimate set of College Football Playoff rankings were released and the committee decided to move Notre Dame down to #10 and Alabama up to #9. If you’ve been paying attention to me over the past few weeks — this is pretty much what I expected from the committee. They want Bama in the playoff […]

items.title: Notre Dame set to bring in a historic class on National Signing Day
items.summary: It’s National Signing Day on Wednesday for Notre Dame Football and the rest of the country. Over the years we have seen the calendar change several times for the recruiting cycle, and this year brings another change as the early period for Signing Day is sooner than it’s ever been — which is fine. Now […]

items.title: Notre Dame Football Stats: The ACC Comparison with Irish Players
items.summary: The 2025-26 regular season is closed for Notre Dame football.  The team’s final record was 10-2 and all signs point to a College Football Playoff berth.  It’s also time for the annual intensification of arguments about why the Irish’s Independent status should:  1 Automatically bar them from CFP participation 2. Completely bar them from Power […]

items.title: 2025 Notre Dame Football Schedule, TV Times, Stat Leaders, Roster, and Results
items.summary: The Notre Dame football team has finished the regular season and are awaiting to see what will happen for the post season — namely, the college football playoff. Despite the loss in Miami, and against Texas A&M, the Irish still have a chance to bring home its 23rd national championship thanks to doing what they […]

items.title: How Notre Dame’s opponents fared in week 14 of the college football season
items.summary: Notre Dame got off to a rough start in 2025, but they looked like they fixed a few things in a 56-30 win over the Purdue Boilermakers and then the 56-13 win on the road against the Arkansas Razorbacks. They followed those two victories with two victories which covered massive spreads in a 28-7 win […]
